# Talk to your presentation and control it

Say "next slide" to go to the next slide. Let's go over how Bob's day was. Bob is a random person.

## Getting up

- Turn off alarm
- Get out of bed
- Take a shower

::: footer
Say "previous slide" to go to the previous slide.
:::

## Breakfast

- Eat eggs
- Drink coffee

::: footer
Say "last slide" to go to the last slide.
:::

# In the evening

## Dinner

- Eat spaghetti
- Drink wine

::: footer 
Say "first slide" to go to the first slide.
:::

## Going to sleep

- Get in bed
- Count sheep

::: footer 
You can change the keyword phrases to whatever you want in the YAML header. The defaults are listed in the [repo readme](https://github.com/parmsam/quarto-flashcards/blob/main/README.md#using).
:::
